name: Fathom Los Cabos Mask, Snorkel and Fin Set
categories: Los Cabos Mask, Snorkel and Fin Set
description: This set is a great option for those learning to snorkel or to bring on your vacation. Tempered glass lenses provide excellent visibility when looking down into the deep and the fins have a channel that makes cruising fast and efficient.Medium-volume mask features inverted teardrop lenses that maximise downward field of view.Soft nosepiece allows you to equalize by pinching your nostrils, even while wearing thick gloves.Soft silicone skirt provides a secure and comfortable seal.Adjustable silicone headband.Dry snorkel lets you dive and resurface without taking in water.Any water that does enter can be purged via a valve on the mouthpiece.Silicone connector conforms to your face, reducing jaw fatigue.Comfortable silicone mouthpiece.Thermoplastic fins feature a flexing center panel that channels flow and increases efficiency.Open heel accomodates a range of foot sizes.
